origin.origins_minus.stranger.name: Stranger
origin.origins_minus.stranger.descriptio:
The standard minecraft experience.

§oLet's not quarrel with who or what you are - It's time to get started.§r
origin.origins_minus.unspecialized.name: Unspecialized
origin.origins_minus.unspecialized.descr:
No specific advantages.

§oJack of all trades, master of none.§r

origin.origins_minus.starved.name: Starved
origin.origins_minus.mer.name: Mer
origin.origins_minus.sanguine.name: Sanguine

power.origins_minus.bioluminescence.name: Bioluminescence
power.origins_minus.blink.name: Submerged Blink
power.origins_minus.blood.name: Blood
tooltip.origins_minus.blood.starve: Without blood, you burn in the sun.
tooltip.origins_minus.blood.snacking: Food is edible, but won't replenish blood.
power.origins_minus.bound.name: Bound
power.origins_minus.brace.name: Brace
tooltip.origins_minus.brace.falls: Bracing into falls is faster, but safer.
power.origins_minus.echolocation.name: Echolocation
power.origins_minus.echolocation.descrip: You can see in the dark, and enemies behind walls.
power.origins_minus.edible_seagrass.name: Osmoregulation
tooltip.origins_minus.edible_seagrass.sh: You can collect seagrass without shears.
power.origins_minus.energetic.name: Energetic
tooltip.origins_minus.energetic.air_spee: Your speed carries in the air.
power.origins_minus.fall_immunity.name: Carefree
tooltip.origins_minus.fall_immunity.boun: You bounce slightly to absorb falls.
power.origins_minus.fast_eating.name: Ravenous
power.origins_minus.fire_immunity.name: Flamehardy
power.origins_minus.fire_punch.name: Temper Temper
power.origins_minus.flap.name: Flap
power.origins_minus.frenzy.name: Frenzy
power.origins_minus.frenzy.description: Become empowered by feeding from a target.
tooltip.origins_minus.frenzy.active: Active ability, use with %s while sneaking and empty-handed.
tooltip.origins_minus.frenzy.targets: Works on players and blooded monsters.
tooltip.origins_minus.frenzy.cancel: Interrupted by getting hurt or sneaking again.
tooltip.origins_minus.frenzy.extend: Enemies killed during frenzy extend it, restoring blood.
power.origins_minus.glide.name: Air Control
power.origins_minus.glide.description: Slow your descent to glide or prevent falls.
tooltip.origins_minus.glide.safe_fall: Sneak to fall safely at speed.
power.origins_minus.hunger_prevent_death: Mortal injury cuts into hunger instead.
power.origins_minus.lava_swimming.name: Molten Cruise
power.origins_minus.nightstalker.name: Nightstalker
power.origins_minus.nightstalker.descrip: You can see in the dark.
power.origins_minus.rappel.name: Rappel
power.origins_minus.rappel.description: Latch to the ceiling, allowing vertical climbing.
power.origins_minus.reach.name: Here Enough
power.origins_minus.rescue.name: Rescue
power.origins_minus.rescue.description: Pull your friends close (and enemies closer).
power.origins_minus.sunlight.name: Sunlight
power.origins_minus.sunlight.description:
Replaces hunger.
Refills in the sun.
tooltip.origins_minus.sunlight.healing: Burns more sunlight to heal faster when full.
power.origins_minus.swim_speed.name: Ocean Free
power.origins_minus.swim_speed.descripti: You move, see, and mine with ease underwater.
power.origins_minus.vine_whip.name: Vine Whip
tooltip.origins_minus.vine_whip.plant_fa: Falls onto plants are less harmful.
power.origins_minus.water_breathing.name: Countercurrent
power.origins_minus.wraparound.name: Wraparound
